name: interpretation_rules

derive_core_signal_profile.description: Aggregates normalized signals across all dimensions using default weight tables.

identify_dominant_motives.description: Ranks motives by influence strength, stress modifiers, and vector contribution.

detect_conflict_points.description: Identifies opposing motive pairs or multidimensional contradictions.

generate_integration_pathways.description: Suggests kernel-aligned ways to reconcile conflict and increase coherence.

apply_stress_modifiers.description: Applies stress-state overrides before narrative assembly.

compute_confidence_profile.description: Evaluates data reliability based on contradictions, missing data, and stress.

notes: Interpretation rules define how raw signals evolve into structured meaning across the system's interpretive layer.
